certificate.help: Certificate used to communicate with Syslog server.
certificate.name: certificate

custom-field-name.help: Custom field name for CEF format logging.
custom-field-name.name: custom-field-name

enc-algorithm.help: Enable/disable reliable syslogging with TLS encryption.
enc-algorithm.name: enc-algorithm

options.help: SSL communication with high and medium encryption algorithms.
options.name: high-medium

options.help: SSL communication with high encryption algorithms.
options.name: high

options.help: SSL communication with low encryption algorithms.
options.name: low

interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.
interface.name: interface

interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.
interface-select-method.name: interface-select-method

options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.
options.name: sdwan

max-log-rate.help: Syslog maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
max-log-rate.name: max-log-rate

mode.help: Remote syslog logging over UDP/Reliable TCP.
mode.name: mode

options.help: Enable legacy reliable syslogging by RFC3195 (Reliable Delivery for Syslog).
options.name: legacy-reliable

options.help: Enable reliable syslogging by RFC6587 (Transmission of Syslog Messages over TCP).
options.name: reliable

options.help: Set Syslog transmission priority to default.
options.name: default

options.help: Set Syslog transmission priority to low.
options.name: low

ssl-min-proto-version.help: Minimum supported protocol version for SSL/TLS connections (default is to follow system global setting).
ssl-min-proto-version.name: ssl-min-proto-version

options.help: Do not log to remote syslog server.
options.name: disable

results.help: Override settings for remote syslog server.
results.name: override-setting
